UnitType.Quote: Looks like dinner is coming to me today.
UnitType.Backstory: You are the Mountain and you worship Earth. Deep into the tunnels, covered in clay and dust, you've found your path. In the darkness, you've found light. And now you shall bring that darkness all over the surface.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: -99% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: May your passing cleanses the world
UnitType.Backstory: The pieces of the Telenanth that the Titans brought over have awakened terrible sleeping giants: Sandworms. It is believed they left their deep underground lairs, attracted by the Shards vibrations, and since then, they have become somewhat legendary for swallowing whole armies in their cavernous mouths. Beware, they are extremely territorial.

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.

UnitType.Description: Slayers are the most expensive and powerful units that can be trained. They combine the best armor, weapons and enchanted items with reliable mounts and advanced training.

UnitType.Description: Swordsmen are great midgame units. Their swords leave a hand free for a shield and their counterattack ability allows them to strike back at enemies that attack them.
